Na Bi Sha Na Mi Shi Zun This Dharani Mantra.
For the fourfold assembly, to attain peace and freedom from afflictions.
Evil ghosts, thieves, water, fire,
Violent storms, evil ghosts,
Fever, cold, wind, and other diseases,
Family business decline, unfavorable directions,
Sudden violent beasts,
Quickly recite this mantra for liberation from all.
Now I will repeat the Dharani Mantra.
Sari Sari Vimba Shaka Quickly go, quickly go, quickly return to your original place.
Peacock King's Mantra Arena.
Use cow dung to smear the ground.
Use seven-colored flowers to scatter.
Forty-nine banners, four knives, four mirrors, one hundred arrows, one bow, seven jars filled with juice.
Black sheep's wool rope sixteen fathoms long.
Twenty-five kinds of thin cakes.
Light seven oil lamps.ğŸ”½One container of yogurt, one container of molasses drink.
